item.title: RLJ Lodging Trust 10-K
item.description: RLJ Lodging Trust, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 28, 2023 had 32184 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: hotel - 440 instances december - 280 instances company - 274 instances 31 - 269 instances may - 257 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
